content.raw:
nit Uber minor, feel free to ignore, but:

`a frame` and `a mobilized frame` sound too generic upon rereading in the preview.

Perhaps the better wording is:

* `Jf` is the frame fixed to the parent link
* `Jm` is the frame fixed to the child link

Saying `mobilized` here is a wee bit confusing, because we don’t really talk about “mobilization” anywhere else.
content.html:
nit Uber minor, feel free to ignore, but:

a frame and a mobilized frame sound too generic upon rereading in the preview.

Perhaps the better wording is:

  • Jf is the frame fixed to the parent link
  • Jm is the frame fixed to the child link

Saying mobilized here is a wee bit confusing, because we don’t really talk about “mobilization” anywhere else.
